actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited exclusion of capital gains realized by taxpayers other than corporations on securities.

summary.text: Small Investors Act - Provides that, in the case of a taxpayer other than a corporation, gross income under the Internal Revenue Code does not include an amount representing the excess of the net long-term capital gain for the year over the net short-term capital loss from the sale or exchange of a security or securities, to the extent that such amount does not exceed $1,000. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 124)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited exclusion of capital gains realized by taxpayers other than corporations on securities.
